name: GhostHotelTale
0:
”Alexa, open ghost hotel tale”
”Alexa, start ghost hotel tale”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ghost hotel tale
des: Alexa will read aloud to you and ask you questions about each passage. Test your memory by remembering tricky details about the story. Answer correctly and achieve a high score. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
